data.eml:eml: A new species of Canace Haliday from Portugal, with a revised key to species (Diptera: Canacidae: Canacinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Munari, Lorenzo, Almeida, Jorge Mota (2014): A new species of Canace Haliday from Portugal, with a revised key to species (Diptera: Canacidae: Canacinae). Zootaxa 3873 (2): 195-200, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3873.2.7
